nodes.text: The Original Trilogy Stories is a collection of eighteen young-reader tales adapting the Star Wars original trilogy. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on September 1, 2015. An unabridged audiobook was released with the Prequel Trilogy stories on March 19, 2019.
Star Wars Treasury: The Original Trilogy, published by Egmont UK Ltd in 2015, uses many of the same illustrations as The Original Trilogy Stories, including the same cover artwork.

Join Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Princess Leia for one action-packed adventure after the next! This collection features 18 stories from the original Star Wars trilogy, beautifully illustrated by Star Wars artist Brian Rood. With foil on the cover, gilded pages, and over 250 pieces of both spot and full-page art, this storybook is a must-have for fans!
